verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This is our God, the Servant King. He calls us now to follow Him, To bring our lives as a daily offering Of worship to the Servant King.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come see His hands and His feet, The scars that speak of sacrifice, Hands that flung stars into space To cruel nails surrendered.{/lang-eng}
